name: Droll & Chainlink Bird
text: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card and target 1 monster on your side of the field; it gains 800 ATK and 1000 DEF. If a Chain Link of 2 or higher resolves that only had "Chainlink" cards while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only activate each effect of "Droll & Chainlink Bird" once per turn.
